about_the_game:
If you've always wanted to try your hand at a farming sim or just need a quaint countryside for your game, this is for you! A charming landscape with cute buildings, plenty of terrain types, and all the graphics you need to build a seasonal garden.

Seasons of Harvest Farm Tileset includes (in EVERY season):

Ground tiles:

Water, lava, poison water
tinted grass
sand
rocky ground
brick path
tile path
concrete and wood path
checker floor
garden row tiles
grass sprigs, mushrooms, ground cover and thorns
plain and overgrown fence
tabletop
and more!

Wall and roof tiles:

thatch roof
metal roof
shingle roof
wood roof
dirt, sand and rocky wall
stone tile wall
red brick wall
wood slat wall
square stones and tiles
white painted wall
4 colors of barn siding - white, natural, blue and red

Also featuring:

matching stairs for ground types
multiple beds and bedding colors
old-fashioned CRT TV
curtains
lots of rugs
benches and tables
shelving
appliances
multiple cute little windows
bathroom fixtures
shop fixtures - checkouts, vending machines, shelving, coolers and more
silos
customizable barn roofing
stables
angled roofs
wildflowers
gates and pens
produce barrels with lots of veggies/fruits
and more!


Events and Animations:

Plants and vegetables (with four stages of growth), doors, big gate and storage box!


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
